hero.name: Erfan Shafiee Moghadam
hero.titleLine3: Workflow Automation, AI Agents, and RAG Systems.
about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: My passion for Artificial Intelligence began with a deep fascination for its potential to solve complex problems and transform technology. This led me to specialize in Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing, where I've gained hands-on experience building and deploying cutting-edge systems.
about.paragraph2: I focus on generative AI, Large Language Models (LLMs), and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), successfully deploying intelligent solutions across various platforms like messengers, web apps, and APIs.
about.paragraph3: What drives me is creating AI that delivers tangible, real-world impact. I'm committed to building smart, efficient, and effective systems, constantly learning and exploring new trends with a collaborative mindset. I thrive on challenges, seeing them as opportunities to push AI's boundaries.
about.skillsHeading: Here's what I bring to the table:
about.skill1: Hands-on experience building LLMs and RAG systems that power real-time, intelligent solutions
about.skill2: A strong foundation in machine learning and NLP, with a focus on delivering practical, innovative results
about.skill3: A love for continuous learning and exploring the ever-evolving world of AI
about.skill4: A collaborative mindset, always excited to work with teams to bring new ideas to life
about.skill5: A passion for creating technology that makes a real difference

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.entry.0.title: Dynamic KG to Variable-Complexity QA via Fact-Augmented Synthesis (EMNLP Submission - Results Pending)
projects.entry.0.description: This project, submitted to EMNLP (results pending), implements a system that dynamically constructs a Knowledge Graph (KG) from conversational interactions and LLM outputs. It then generates Question/Answer pairs of varying complexity from this KG, augmented by external factual information (e.g., Wikipedia). Features dual agent implementations (GPT & REBEL) for knowledge extraction, Wikipedia integration for node descriptions with ambiguity resolution, and robust Neo4j storage. The system also includes automated QA generation from graph paths.
projects.entry.0.alt: Icon representing knowledge graph processing: a question mark transforms into a lightbulb, illustrating 'KG to QA'.
projects.entry.1.title: Document Chatbot with Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG)
projects.entry.1.description: An interactive document retrieval system using RAG and a Streamlit interface. Supports multiple document formats (PDF, TXT, CSV, DOCX), AI-powered chat for natural language queries, document summarization, prompt refinement, and conversation history.
projects.entry.1.alt: Icon for Document Chatbot: stacked documents with a chat bubble and magnifying glass, labeled 'ChatDocs'.
projects.entry.2.title: Hooshews (هوشیوز) - AI Reference
projects.entry.2.description: Hooshews is a Persian-language reference for Artificial Intelligence, covering the latest news, practical tutorials (from basic to advanced), introductions to AI tools, and reviews of its applications. The goal is to provide AI knowledge accurately, up-to-date, and understandably for Persian speakers. Content includes daily AI news, prompt engineering, AI tool reviews, and practical AI applications.
projects.entry.2.alt: Hooshews AI Reference logo: 'هوشیوز AI' in stylized typography, symbolizing an AI knowledge resource.
projects.entry.3.title: Custom Excel Data Processing & Comparison Tool
projects.entry.3.description: Developed a Python application with an intuitive Tkinter GUI to compare planned and historical shipping data from Excel files. The tool features smart header detection, flexible data preprocessing (cleaning, validation, aggregation), multi-file merging, and generates a professionally styled, multi-sheet Excel output. Output includes a main comparison sheet and diagnostic sheets for bad part numbers and duplicates, ensuring data transparency. Designed for robust, repeatable workflows for business users and analysts.
projects.entry.3.alt: Icon for Excel Data Processor: a messy Excel sheet transforms into a clean, organized one, labeled 'Excel Simplified'.
projects.entry.4.title: Artify-AI: Artistic Image Representor
projects.entry.4.description: An artistic image representation tool using Streamlit. It integrates BLIP Image Captioning for generating captions, ChatGPT 3.5 Turbo for refining them, and Stable Diffusion (v1.5) for generating new images based on the enhanced captions. Users can upload an image, generate/enhance captions, create new images, and download results.
projects.entry.4.alt: Artify-AI icon: a split image showing a simple sketch transforming into a colorful artistic rendering.
projects.entry.5.title: Sentiment and Emotion Analysis Application
projects.entry.5.description: A practical tool leveraging DistilBERT for sentiment analysis (positive, negative, neutral) and RoBERTa for emotion detection (top six emotions). Offers both Streamlit and Gradio interfaces with features like theme selection, history, tutorials (Streamlit), and text suggestions (Gradio).
projects.entry.5.alt: Sentiment AI icon: text with positive, negative, and neutral emotion icons, labeled 'Sentiment AI'.
projects.entry.6.title: Undergraduate Projects (Supervised by Dr. Mohammad Bahrani)
projects.entry.6.description.intro: Associated with Allameh Tabataba'i University (Mar 2023 - Mar 2024). Supervised by Dr. Mohammad Bahrani.
projects.entry.6.description.subProjects: Data analysis and modeling using Logistic Regression and MLP.
Predicting Apple stock prices using RNN and LSTM.
Predicting the next word, exploring NLTK, GloVe, and BERT.
Sentiment analysis of movie reviews in English.
Sentiment analysis of hotel reviews in Persian, using fastText.
projects.entry.6.alt: Allameh Tabataba'i University (ATU) logo with text 'ML & DL Capstones', representing undergraduate AI research projects.
